meanings.sent1: The cold weather solidifies the water into ice.
meanings.sent2: The cement solidifies as it dries in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The magic potion solidifies instantly, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her determination solidifies her resolve to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor's careful touch solidifies the clay into a beautiful statue.

meanings.definition: To make or become firm or stable.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise solidifies your muscles over time.
meanings.sent2: The new policy solidifies the company's position in the market.
meanings.sent3: The friendship solidifies after they share a secret handshake.
meanings.sent4: The strong bond between them solidifies their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The foundation of the building solidifies its structure for years to come.
